Sub-Sub-Librarian

seen
mere

grub-worm
poor
devil
Sub-Sub
appears
gone
long

street-stalls
earth

picking
whatever

allusions
whales
could
anyways
find
book
whatsoever

sacred
profane
.

must

every

take
higgledy-piggledy
whale
statements

however

extracts

veritable

cetology
.

.
touching
ancient
authors
generally

well
poets

,
extracts
solely

glancing
bird
’
eye
view
promiscuously
said
,

sung
Leviathan

many
nations

including
.
fare
thee
well
,
poor
devil
Sub-Sub

whose
commentator
.
Thou
belongest
hopeless
,
sallow
tribe
wine
world
ever
warm
;
even
Pale
Sherry
would
rosy-strong
;
one
sometimes
loves
sit
,
feel
poor-devilish
,
;
grow
convivial
upon
tears
;
say
bluntly
,
full
eyes
empty
glasses
,
altogether
unpleasant
sadness—Give
,
Sub-Subs
!
much
pains
ye
take
please
world
,
much
shall
ye
ever
go
thankless
!
Would
could
clear
Hampton
Court
Tuileries
ye
!
gulp
tears
hie
aloft

;
friends
gone

,

long-pampered
Gabriel
,
Michael
,
Raphael
,
coming
.
ye
strike
splintered
hearts
together—there
,
ye
shall
strike
unsplinterable
glasses
!

CHAPTER
20
.
Astir
.
day

41

,

,

level

sun

,
